update india_cin
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cin = #{cin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

registration_number = #{registrationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_category = #{companyCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_sub_category = #{companySubCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_of_company = #{classOfCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authorised_capital = #{authorisedCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paid_up_capital = #{paidUpCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number_of_members = #{numberOfMembers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_of_incorporation = #{dateOfIncorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_id = #{emailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
whether_listed_or_not = #{whetherListedOrNot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
active_compliant = #{activeCompliant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
suspended_at_stock_exchange = #{suspendedAtStockExchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update india_cin set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cin = #{cin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roc_code = #{rocCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registration_number = #{registrationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_category = #{companyCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_sub_category = #{companySubCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_of_company = #{classOfCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authorised_capital = #{authorisedCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paid_up_capital = #{paidUpCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number_of_members = #{numberOfMembers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_of_incorporation = #{dateOfIncorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_id = #{emailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, whether_listed_or_not = #{whetherListedOrNot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active_compliant = #{activeCompliant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suspended_at_stock_exchange = #{suspendedAtStockExchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_of_last_agm = #{dateOfLastAgm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_of_balance_sheet = #{dateOfBalanceSheet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_status = #{companyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_address = #{registeredAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT 200 code, india_cin.id cin_id, india_cin.enterprise_id cin_enterprise_id, india_cin.cin cin_cin, india_cin.company_name cin_company_name, india_cin.roc_code cin_roc_code, india_cin.registration_number cin_registration_number, india_cin.company_category cin_company_category, india_cin.company_sub_category cin_company_sub_category, india_cin.class_of_company cin_class_of_company, india_cin.authorised_capital cin_authorised_capital, india_cin.paid_up_capital cin_paid_up_capital, india_cin.number_of_members cin_number_of_members, india_cin.date_of_incorporation cin_date_of_incorporation, india_cin.email_id cin_email_id, india_cin.whether_listed_or_not cin_whether_listed_or_not, india_cin.active_compliant cin_active_compliant, india_cin.suspended_at_stock_exchange cin_suspended_at_stock_exchange, india_cin.date_of_last_agm cin_date_of_last_agm, india_cin.date_of_balance_sheet cin_date_of_balance_sheet, india_cin.company_status cin_company_status, india_cin.registered_address cin_registered_address, india_charge.id charge_id, india_charge.enterprise_id charge_enterprise_id, india_charge.srn charge_srn, india_charge.charge_id charge_charge_id, india_charge.charge_holder_name charge_charge_holder_name, india_charge.date_of_creation charge_date_of_creation, india_charge.date_of_modification charge_date_of_modification, india_charge.date_of_satisfaction charge_date_of_satisfaction, india_charge.amount charge_amount, india_charge.address charge_address, india_signatory.id signatory_id, india_signatory.enterprise_id signatory_enterprise_id, india_signatory.din_pan signatory_din_pan, india_signatory.`name` signatory_name, india_signatory.begin_date signatory_begin_date, india_signatory.end_date signatory_end_date, india_signatory.surrendered_din signatory_surrendered_din FROM india_cin LEFT JOIN india_charge ON india_cin.enterprise_id = india_charge.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN india_signatory ON india_cin.enterprise_id = india_signatory.enterprise_id WHERE india_cin.`status` = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} AND india_cin.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
